title: Invited Speakers
text:
Agata Smoktunowicz â€” University of Edinburgh (UK)
Ilaria Colazzo â€” University of Leeds (UK)
Anastasia Doiku â€” Heriot-Watt University (UK)
Eric Jespers â€” Vrije Universiteit Brussel (Belgium)

This line-up features prominent researchers in algebra, combinatorics, and mathematical physics, whose work intersects with the Yangâ€“Baxter equation. Their contributions will highlight current developments and open problems in the field.
We also welcome PhD students and postdocs to share their research in the Gong Talk session.
To register registration.
